description: With Election Day fast approaching, we're looking at the financial issues that might impact who you're going to vote for -- from Social Security to retirement, Medicare to food stamps. Plus, in the aftermath of superstorm Sandy, we take a look at how disasters can pull communities together and offer some advice on how you can protect yourself from scams.
title: Marketplace Money for Friday, November 2, 2012
byline: Peter O'Dowd, Tess Vigeland, Shereen Marisol Meraji, Helaine Olen, David Gura, Andy Kindler, Brian Donovan and Chris Farrell
teaser: With Election Day fast approaching, we're looking at the financial issues that might impact who you're going to vote for -- from Social Security to retirement, Medicare to food stamps. Plus, in the aftermath of superstorm Sandy, we take a look at how disasters can pull communities together and offer some advice on how you can protect yourself from scams.
